content:
Praia do Camilo is located about 4 kilometers south of Lagos, Portugal. It takes approximately 10-15 minutes to get there by car, depending on traffic and your starting location in Lagos.

There is also a walking trail that leads from Lagos to Praia do Camilo, which takes around 30-40 minutes to walk. The trail offers stunning views of the coastline and is a popular option for those who want to explore the area on foot. However, keep in mind that the trail can be steep and challenging in some areas.

If you don't have a car or don't feel like walking, there are also buses and taxis available that can take you to the beach.
